trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controle.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>é gerado quando um botão dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada sempre que esse evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: Botões dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle também pode invocar alguns dos recursos internos do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Para executar uma dessas operações, defina o `CommandName` propriedade de um botão para um dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Valor CommandName | Descrição | |-----------------------|-----------------| |" Cancelar "| Cancela uma operação de edição ou de inserção e retorna o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle para o modo especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>. | |" Excluir "| Exclui o registro atual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>. | |" Editar "| Coloca o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Insert"|Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>. | |" Inserir "| Insere o registro atual na fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.| |"New"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>. | |" Novo "| Coloca o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle no modo de inserção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Page"|Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>. | |" Página "| Executa uma operação de paginação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Definir o `CommandArgument` propriedade do botão para "Primeira", "último", "Próximo", "Anterior" ou um número de página para especificar o tipo de operação de paginação para executar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>. | |" Atualização "| Atualiza o registro atual na fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> events.| Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you handle the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>e eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>. | Embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>evento é gerado quando um botão listado na tabela anterior é clicado, é recomendável que você manipule os eventos listados na tabela para a operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormViewCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado FormViewCommandEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
